title: Tamizhanda Song Lyrics Kolanji
stanzas:
Ulagathin mudhal inam naanga
manithathin maru peyar naanga
kal thondri man thondraa
antha kaalathil piranthavan naanga

em marabil jaathigal illai
em kulathil vedhangal illai
samathuvathin pillaigal naanga
thala nimirndhe nadappondaa

pirappukum ellaa uyirkkum
sonnavan tamizhanthaan
yaadhum oorey yaavarum kaelir
sonnavan tamizhanthaan

kalvi selvam kondu
vazhnthavan tamizhanthaan
ellai ivanukku illai
ulagam mattumthaan

Ulagathin mudhal inam naanga
manithathin maru peyar naanga
kal thondri man thondraa
antha kaalathil piranthavan naanga

em marabil jaathigal illai
em kulathil vedhangal illai
samathuvathin pillaigal naanga
thala nimirndhe nadappondaa

seo.title: Tamizhanda Song Lyrics Kolanji
seo.description: Get the complete Tamizhanda Song Lyrics Kolanji from Kolanji. Read the lyrics penned by Naveen M and composed by Natarajan Sankaran and sung by Deepak. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Naveen M, Kolanji, Natarajan Sankaran, Deepak, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
